activities: Deem, Inc., formerly known as Rearden Commerce, ("Deem")is a next generation eCommerce platform company that offers Smart Apps, services, content and powerful personalization capabilities that enable relevant and meaningful transactions. Deem obtains personal information directly from consumers, such as through its websites and mobile applications.  In addition, Deem receives personal information from business customers that obtain the company’s products and services for use by their employees or customers. Deem may use the personal information to (i) provide products or services customers request, (ii) provide business customers with the information regarding transactions completed by their employees or customers on the Rearden Commerce platform, (iii) understand customers’ needs and interests and customize the company’s products and services, (iii) communicate with users about products, services, offers, events and promotions, (iv) operate, evaluate and improve our business and the products and services we offer, (v) comply with legal requirement, and (vi) for other purposes described in the company’s Global Privacy Statement.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Off-line, on-line and manually processed data.
recoursemech: Deem will cooperate with JAMS in accordance with the JAMS International Mediation Rules.
